PC Hardware Standards

CA&ES CRU Hardware Standards for PC Desktops and Laptops

PC Desktop

Dell Optiplex 9020

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 Processor
  • Memory: 8GB 1600MHz DDR3 Memory
  • Storage: 500GB Solid State Hybrid Drive

PDF Factsheet


PC Laptop

Dell Latitude E6430s

  • Processor: 3rd gen Intel Core i5-3340M Processor
  • Memory: 8GB 1600MHz DDR3 Memory
  • Storage: 256GB Mobility Solid State Drive

PDF Factsheet
